conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model successfully translates the 2D floor plan into a clean isometric cutaway with clear wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric projection with consistent wall thickness and clear interior volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate room configuration and wall placement. Deduction for the balcony entry area which is slightly simplified compared to the complex notch in the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D layout well (bed, sofa, dining table). Kitchen and bathroom fixtures are correctly placed.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. Geometry is readable. Minor point: some doors/frames are rendered as low-height partitions rather than full openings.

detected_errors.description: The balcony door geometry and the foyer entrance door orientation/existence differ slightly in architectural detail from the 2D drawing.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric correspondence with the original 2D floor plan.
